definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[יׇדַע]]:943 vb. know (NH. id., Aram. [[יְדַע]] yda9; Ph. [[ידע]]; Eth. 0ayd9a II. I. indicate, announce, narrate; As. idû, know, COT:Gloss; Sab. [[ידע]], esp. in cpd. n.pr. DHM:ZMG 1875, 612)—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: know, learn to know, good and evil Ge 3:22 (J), sq. [[אֶת־אֲשֶׁר]] 1Sa 28:9; [[מִסְפַּר הָעָם]] 2Sa 24:2; anything [[מְאוּמָה]] 1Sa 20:39; [[לאׁ יׇדַע אִתּוֹ מְאוּמָה]] Ge 36:6 (v. II. [[אֵךְ]]

definitions.title: 1. b
definitions.body: ), so v:Ge 36:8; [[כָּל־דָּבָר]] 2Sa 15:11, subj. God, knowing fowls Ps 50:11; way to wisdom Job 28:23; etc.; of bird of prey [[נׇתִיב לאׁ יְדָעוֹ עָָיִט]] Job 28:7; the price of wisdom Job 28:13; something future [[יום מוֹתִי]] Ge 27:2 (J); esp. sq. cl. Ge 12:11 (J) I Know that thou art a woman of fair appearance, Ge 22:12 (E), Ec 1:17; [[לאׁ ידעתי]] Ge 28:16; answering qu. Where ? without other obj., Ge 4:9 (both J); sq. acc. + [[בְּ]], in, in the matter of (v. [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: 1 2 b
definitions.body: ) [[זאׁת דָּבָר קָטׂן אוֹ גדוֹל לאׁ יׇדַע עַבְדְּ ְבְּכָל־]] 1Sa 22:15 thy servant knoweth not of all this anything, little or much; sq. [[בְּ]] (rare), gain knowledge of, learn of or about, c. inf. [[הֲֵתדַע בְּשׂוּם־אֱלוֹהַּ עֲלֵיהֶם]] Job 37:15 dost thou know about God's enjoining upon them? also c. subst. [[אִישׁ אַל־יֵדַע בַּדְּבָרִים הָאֵלֶּה]] Je 38:24 let not a man know of these words; similarly sq. [[עַל]], only [[הֲֵתדַע עַל־מִפְלְשֵׂי־עָָב]] Job 37:16 dost thou know concerning the balancings of clouds? (in Job 12:9 [[בְּ]] is instr., as Ge 15:8, Ps 41:12); sq. [[מִן]], [[הַמַּחֲבׂאִים רְאוּ וּדְעוּ מִכָּל־]] 1Sa 23:23 observe and get knowledge of all the hiding-places; but sq. obj. cl. + [[מִן]] of source, [[קֶדֶם יׇדַעְתִּי מֵעֵדׂתֶָי ְכִּי]] Ps 119:152 long ago I gained knowledge out of thy testimonies that etc.; sq. [[לְ]], have knowledge of, † [[יׇדַעְתָּ לְאִוַּלְתִּי]] Ps 69:6 thou knowest my foolishness; esp. [[יהוה וידע כי אני]] and he shall (thou shalt, etc.) know that I am Yahweh Ex 10:2 (R), Ex 6:7, Ex 14:4, Ex 16:12, Ex 29:46 (all P), Ez Eze 6:7, Eze 6:10, Eze 6:13 + oft. in Ezek., 1Ki 20:13, 1Ki 20:28; sq. acc., which is really subj. of foll. cl., Ge 18:19 (J) I know him that he will, etc. 2Sa 3:25 (Ges:§117. 1, R. 6).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: perceive Ge 19:33, Ge 19:35 (J; obj. cl. inf. c. [[בְּ]]); with added idea of observing, taking note of, a place, acc. Ru 3:4; c. [[בְּ]], [[יׇדַעְתָּ בְּחָרוֹת נַפְשִׁי]] Ps 31:8 (‖[[רָאָה אֶת־]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ‖[[ראה]], imv. [[דע וראה]] perceive and see 1Sa 12:17, 1Sa 24:12; find out and discern 1Sa 14:38, 1Sa 23:22; in reverse order, [[ראו ודעו]] only 1Sa 23:23 (v.

definitions.title: a
definitions.body: supr.), Je 5:1 (v. Dr:Sm).—Vid.also

definitions.title: g
definitions.body: infr.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: discriminate, distinguish [[הַאֵדַע בֵּין־טוֹב לְרָָע]] 2Sa 19:36, cf. De 1:29 (no [[בֵּין]]); [[לאׁ יׇדְֽעוּ בֵין־יְמִינוֹ לִשְׂמאׁלוֹ]] Jon 4:11 they cannot distinguish between their right hand and their left.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: know by experience, [[לְבִבְכֶם וּבְכָל־נַפְשְׁכֶם כִּי וִידַעְתֶּם בְּכָל־]] Jos 23:14 (D) and know in all your hearts, and all your souls, that, etc.; learn to know ´[[י]] Ho 13:14; learn (a bitter lesson) Ho 9:7, Is 9:8, Ps 14:4; experience ´[[י]]'s vengeance Ez Eze 25:14, Ps 14:4 (abs.); quietness Job 20:20.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: recognise, admit, acknowledge, confess Je 3:13, Je 14:20, Is 59:12, Ps 51:5.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: consider [[דְּעוּ מַה־תַּעֲשׂוּ]] Ju Jdg 18:14; ‖[[ראה]], imv. [[דע וראה]], [[דעו וראו]], 2Sa 24:13, 1Ki 20:7, 1Ki 20:22; also [[וְיׇדַעְתָּ עִם־לִבָבֶָ ְכִּי]] De 8:5 and thou shalt consider with (in) thy heart, that, De 4:39.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: [[לאׁ ידע]] not know = not except Is 47:11, Ps 35:8.

know  a person, be acquainted with Ge 29:5 (J), Ex 1:8 (E), Job 42:11, know ´[[י]] Job 24:1; c [[לאׁ]], obj. esp. other gods, strange land, etc. = have no knowledge of, or acquaintance with, have not heard of, esp. Dt Je:—De 11:28, De 13:3, De 13:7, De 13:14, De 28:64, De 29:25, De 32:17 (poem), Je 7:9, Je 9:15, Je 14:18, Je 16:13, Je 17:4, Je 19:4, Je 22:28, Je 44:3; pt. act. acquaintance Job 19:13; † pt. pass. acquainted with [[אִישׁ מַכְאׂבוֹת וִידוּעַ חָׂלִי]] Is 53:3 (lit. known of sickness, v. Thes Ew Che Di Du); well-known (with implied trustworthiness) De 1:13, De 1:15 †; of beasts knowing owner and master's crib Is 1:3 (cf. Je 8:7); esp. of knowing God (´[[י]])[[לאׁ יׇדַעְתִּי ]] ´[[אֶת־י]] Ex 5:2 (J); involving intelligent worship, obedience, etc. Ju Jdg 2:10, 1Sa 2:12 (rd. [[יֵדַע]] for MT [[יׇדַע]] Dr), 1Sa 3:7, Ho 2:22, Ho 8:2, Ho 5:4, Job 18:21, Ps 79:6 (v. also [[דַּעַת]]

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ); of God's Knowing persons etc., throughly Ho 5:3, Job 11:11; knowing the heart 1Ki 8:39, 2Ch 6:30, Ps 139:4; knowing his true servants, recognising and acknowledgingthem 2Sa 7:20, Na 1:7, 1Ch 17:18 +; [[יְדַעְתִּי ְבְּשֵׁם]] Ex 33:12 (JE); = take notice of, regardPs 1:6, Ps 31:7, Ps 37:18; so of Isr. as chosen people Am 3:2, Ho 13:5 (As. idûšu, God regardeth him, Hpt:BAS i, 15) cf. Ge 18:19 (J).

know a personcarnally, of sexual intercourse, sq. acc.: man subj. Ge 4:1, Ge 4:17, Ge 4:25, Ge 24:16, Ge 38:26 (all J), 1Sa 1:19, Ju Jdg 19:25, 1Ki 1:4; woman subj. Ge 19:8 (J), Nu 31:17, Nu 31:18, Nu 31:35 (all P), Ju Jdg 11:39; [[יׁדַעַת]] [[מִשְׁכַּב זׇכָר]] Ju Jdg 21:11; [[לאׁ יׇדְֽעָה אִישׁ לְמִשְׁכַּב זׇכָר]] v:Jdg 21:12; man subj. and obj. (of sodomy) Ge 19:5 (J), Ju Jdg 19:22.

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: know how to do a thing, be able to do it, oft. c. [[לאׁ]] and sq. inf. [[לאׁ יׇדְֽעוּ עֲשׂוֹת־]] [[נְכׂחָה]] Am 3:10 they know not how to do right; [[לאׁ]] [[יׇדַעְתִּי דַבֵּר]] Je 1:6, Je 6:15, 1Ki 3:7, Is 56:11, Is 56:11, c. [[לְ]] Is 50:4, Ec 10:15; [[לאׁ יׇדַע לְהִזׇּהֵר]] Ec 4:13 know not how to be admonished (v:Ec 5:1 know that); inf. abs. [[ידע מָאוֹס בָּרָע וּבָחוֹר]] [[בַּטּוֹב]] Is 7:15, Is 7:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be skilful in,esp. pt., sq. acc. [[יׁדֵעַ חַיִד]] Ge 25:27 (J) skilled in hunting; [[ידע סֵפֶר]] skilled in a book, learnedIs 29:11, Is 29:12, Is 29:12; as pl. cstr. [[יוֹדְעֵי נֶ֑הִי]] Am 5:16 knowers of lamentation,professional mourners; [[יׁדְעֵי הַיׇּם]] 1Ki 9:27 skilled in the sea, 2Ch 8:18; esp. sq. inf. [[יׁדֵעַ נַגֵּן]] 1Sa 16:18 skilled in playing,1Ki 5:20, 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:7, 2Ch 2:13: [[יׁדֵעַ מְנַגֵּן]] [[בַּכִנּוֹר]] 1Sa 16:16 knowing, (as) a player on the lyre (v. Dr).

abs. have knowledge, be wise: [[לַיּׁדְעִים]] Ec 9:11 (‖[[חֲכָמִים]], [[נְבׂנִים]]); esp. have knowledge of God and duty, or in practical affairs Is 1:3 (‖[[בין]]), Is 56:10; oft. c. acc. cogn.: [[דַּעַת]] Pr 17:27, Pr 30:3; [[בִּינׇה]] Is 29:24, Pr 4:1, 2Ch 2:12, cf. [[יוֹדְעֵי בִינׇה לָעִתִּים]] 1Ch 12:33 (Baer), Es 1:13; also [[יׁדְעֵי דָּת וׇדִין]] v:Es 1:13; [[יׁדְעֵי דַעַת וּמְבִינֵי מַדָּע]] Da 1:4; obj. [[שֶׂכֶל וּבִינׇה]] 2Ch 2:11 (‖[[בֵּן חָכָם]]); [[חָכְמָה וּמוּסָר]] Pr 1:2 (‖[[הבין אִמְרֵי בִּינׇה]]); [[חָכְמָה]] Pr 24:14, Ec 8:16.

be made known, beor become known,of things Ge 41:31 (sq. [[בְּ]]), Ex 2:14 (both E), Le 4:14 (P), Ju Jdg 16:9, 2Sa 17:19, Na 3:17, Zec 14:7 (sq. [[לְ]]), Ps 77:20, Ps 79:10 (sq. [[בְּ]]); Ps 88:13 (sq. [[בְּ]]); of hand of ´[[י]] Is 66:14 (sq. [[אֶת]]); c. subj. cl. Ex 21:36, Ex 33:16 (both JE), De 21:1, 1Sa 6:3 (sq. [[לְ]]), 1Ki 18:36, Ez Eze 36:32 (sq. [[לְ]]) Ru 3:14, Ec 6:10, Es 2:22 (sq. [[לְ]]); of pers., Pr 31:23 (sq. [[בְּ]]) Is 61:9 (sq. [[בְּ]] and [[בְּתוֹח]]); of ´[[י]] Ps 76:2 (sq. [[בְּ]]); = be revealed, discovered, of pers. 1Sa 22:6, Je 28:9, Pr 10:9; of things Ne 4:9, Pr 12:16, Pr 14:33.

make oneself known,of pers., sq. [[לְ]] Ru 3:3, usu. of God (´[[י]]) Ex 6:3 (P; ‖[[זׇאֵרָא אֶל־]]), Is 19:21, Ez Eze 20:5, sq. [[לְעֵינֵי]] Eze 38:23; sq. [[אֶל־]] Eze 20:9; sq. [[בְּ]] Eze 35:11, Ps 48:4; without prep. Ps 9:17.
be perceived(pass. of

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ), of perception by the eye Ge 41:21 (E), Ps 74:5.
be instructed (pass. of

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: ) Je 31:19, in spiritual sense, through chastisement.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[יִדַּ֫עְתָּ]], only [[ידעתה שַׁחַר מקׂמוֹ]] Job 38:12 Kt; rd. with Qr [[יִדַּעְתָּ הַשַּׁחַר]] cause to know,sq. 2 acc.; so Ps 104:19 acc. to Bae, who rds. [[יִדַּע]], after Aq. Symn.

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Pf. [[יוֹדַעְתִּי]] 1Sa 21:3 I have caused to know, i.e. directed, sq. acc., but rd. [[יוֹעַדְתִּי]] or [[יׇעַדְתִּי]], fr. [[יעד]], so LXX We Dr.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. known [[מידעת]] Is 12:5 Kt (Qr [[מוּדַעַת]] v.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: ); elsewhere as subst. = acquaintance [[מְיֻדָּעִי]] Ps 55:14; [[מְיֻדָּעָיו]] 2Ki 10:11; [[מְיֻדָּעַי]] Ps 88:9, Job 19:14 (‖[[קְרוֹבָָי]]), Ps 88:19 (‖[[אׂהֵב]] and [[רֵעַ]]); [[מְיֻדָּעָָי]] Ps 31:12, Kt [[מידע]] Ru 2:1 (Qr [[מוֹדַע]] q.v. infr.)

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹדִיעַ]] Ps 98:2; [[הוֹדִיעַ֫נִי]] Je 11:18; [[הוֹדַ֫עְתָּ]] 1Ki 1:27 + 2 t.; [[הוֹדָָעְתָּ]] Job 26:3, etc.; Impf. [[יוֹדִיעַ]] Ps 103:7, Is 38:19; juss. [[יׁדַ֫ע]] Nu 16:5; [[וַיּׂדַע]] Ju Jdg 8:16; [[יוֹדִיעֶנּוּ]] Is 40:13, Is 40:14; 2 ms. [[תּוֹדִיעַ]] Hb Hab 3:2; [[תּוֹדִיעֵנִי]] Ps 16:11, Ps 51:8; 1 S. [[אוֹדִיעַ]] Ps 89:2, Ez Eze 39:7; [[אוֹדִיעָה]] Pr 1:23, Is 5:5; [[יוֹדִיעוּ]] Job 32:7; [[יוֹדִעֻם]] Ez Eze 44:23; [[נוֹדִיעָה]] 1Sa 14:12; Imv. [[הוֹדַע]] Pr 9:9 + 3 t. ([[הוֹדַָע]] Ps 90:12); sf. [[הוֹדִיעֵנִי]] Job 10:2 + 6 t., etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הוֹדִיעַ]] 2Sa 7:21 + 3 t.; [[הׂדִיעַ]] 1Ch 17:19; [[הוֹדִיעֵנִי]] 1Sa 28:15, etc.; Pt. [[מוֹדִיְעְֲ]] Da 8:19; [[מוֹדִיעָם]] Je 16:21; [[מוֹדִיעִים]] Is 47:13, 2Ch 23:13; —make known, declare, c. acc. rei Nu 16:5 (P), Ez Eze 39:7, 1Ch 17:19, Job 26:3, Ps 89:2, Ps 98:2, Ps 106:8; obj. om. Hb Hab 3:2; teach, c. acc. rei Job 32:7; sq. inf. Ps 90:12 and (peculiarly) [[לְהַלֵּל]] ´[[מ]] 2Ch 23:13 i.e.led in praising; c. [[לְ]] pers. Pr 9:9; c. acc. pers. Is 40:13, Ju Jdg 8:16 (but rd. [[וַיׇּ֫דָשׁ]], v. [[דושׁ]]); make known, declare, c. acc. rei, + [[לְ]] pers. Ex 18:20, De 4:9, Ne 8:12, Ne 9:14, Ps 78:5, Ps 103:7, Ps 145:12, Is 38:19, Is 64:1; c. cl. of thing, + [[לְ]] pers. 1Sa 10:8; make one know, c. cl. of thing and acc. (sf.) pers. Ex 33:12, De 8:3, 1Sa 6:2, 1Sa 16:3, 1Sa 28:15, Job 10:2, Job 37:19; c. acc. rei + sf. pers. [[הוֹדִעֵנִי נׇא אֶת־]] [[דְּרָêֶכ ְוְאֵדָעְֲ]] Ex 33:13 (JE) make me, I pray, to know thy ways, that I may know thee; Je 16:21, Ez Eze 20:4, Eze 22:2, Eze 43:11, Is 40:14 (‖[[וַיְלַמְּדֵהוּ דַעַת]], also v:a [[וַיְבִינֵהוּ]]), Pr 22:21, Job 13:23, Ps 16:11, Ps 25:4 (‖[[לַמְּדֵנִי]]), v:Ps 25:14 (on inf. c. [[לְ]] v. Ges:§ 114, 2, R. 2, Exx,), Ps 39:5, Ps 51:8, Ps 143:8 (‖[[הַשְׁמִיעֵנִי]]); [[חַטָּאתִי אוֹדִיעְֲ]] Ps 32:5 (‖[[עֲוֹנִי לאׁ־כִסִּיתִי]]); sq. 2 separate acc. Ge 41:39 (E), 1Sa 14:12, Is 5:5, Ez Eze 20:1, Eze 16:2, Pr 1:23, Da 8:19; acc. pers. om. Ex 18:16 (E); acc. rei om. Jos 4:22 = teach one (D), so Is 40:13, 2Sa 7:21, 1Ki 1:27; = answer Job 38:2, Job 40:7, Job 42:4; c. sf. pers., acc. rei om. Je 11:18, Je 16:21, Pr 22:19; sq. acc. rei + [[בְּ]] Ps 77:15 thou hast made known thy might among the peoples, Is 12:4, 1Ch 18:8 = Ps 105:1; sq. cl. + [[בְּ]] pers. Ho 5:9; sq. [[בֵּין]], teach the difference between, to discriminate between [[בֵּין]] [[הַטָּמֵא לְטָהוֹר]] Ez Eze 22:26; + sf. pers. Eze 44:23 (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 1 d
definitions.body: ); sq. [[מִן]] partit. [[מוֹדִעִים לֶחֳדָשִׁים מֵאֲשֶׁר יׇבוֹאוּ]] Is 47:13 who declare, at the new moons, of (the things) which are to come.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹדַע]] Le 4:23, Le 4:28 (v. Kö:i, 427); Pt. [[מוּדַעַת]] Qr Is 12:5 (> Kt [[מְידַֻּעַת]]);—made known (Pt.) Qr Is 12:5 let this be made known in ([[בְּ]]) all the earth (> Kt Pu. Pt. which is not elsewhere in this sense); sq. [[אֵלָיו]] if his sin be made known unto himself Le 4:23, Le 4:28 (P).

definitions.title: Hitph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[אֶתְוַדָָּע]] Nu 12:6 (E); sq: [[אֶל־]] make oneself known to, of ´[[י]]; Inf. [[הִתְוַדַּע אֶל־]] Ge 45:1 (E), of Joseph.
